original_text: Uzziah died and they buried him near his ancestors. Because he had the terrible disease on his skin, they did not bury him beside the other kings that had died. Instead they buried him in a field for graves that belonged to the kings of Judah.
korean_text: 웃시야가 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 그는 나병환자라 하여 왕들의 묘실에 접한 땅 곧 그의 조상들의 곁에 장사하니라 그의 아들 요담이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: and they buried him near his ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 그의 조상들 가까이에 장사하였다

sentences.original_text: Because he had the terrible disease on his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 피부에 끔찍한 질병이 있었기 때문에

sentences.original_text: they did not bury him beside the other kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 다른 왕들 곁에 장사하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Instead they buried him in a field for graves
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 그들은 그를 무덤이 있는 들판에 장사하였다

sentences.original_text: that belonged to the kings of Judah
